subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Garrett Gilbert was announced as Texas’ starting quarterback for Saturday’s season opener against Rice. It is a second chance for Gilbert, who threw 17 interceptions and just 10 touchdown passes last season.
snippet: Garrett Gilbert was announced as Texas’ starting quarterback for Saturday’s season opener against Rice. It is a second chance for Gilbert, who threw 17 interceptions and just 10 touchdown passes last season.
